original_text: But two or three people must agree about what the person has done. You must never kill anyone because of the words of only one person.
korean_text: 죽일 자를 두 사람이나 세 사람의 증언으로 죽일 것이요 한 사람의 증언으로는 죽이지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: But two or three people must agree
about what the person has done

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 결코 누구도 죽여서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: because of the words of only one person
